title.en: A Prayer of Aspiration for the Flourishing and Spread of the Ancient Translation Tradition

text.en: Homage to you, sugatas in every direction, along with all your heirs,
text.en-trans: namo, chok chü dewar shekpa sé dangché

text.en: And especially to you, the one and only King of the Śākyas,
text.en-trans: khyepar nyammé shakyé gyalpo dang

text.en: With the Eight Great Bodhisattvas and the exalted assembly of arhats.
text.en-trans: gyalsé gyé dang neten pakpé tsok

text.en: Sublime embodiments all of wisdom and compassion: turn your loving gaze toward us!
text.en-trans: khyentsé daknyi chok nam gong su sol

text.en: This precious teaching, source of all benefit, happiness and bliss,
text.en-trans: pendé jungné tenpa rinpoche

text.en: Is the truth for which our teacher, Lord Buddha, and all the supreme bodhisattvas
text.en-trans: tön dang sempa pakpa chok nam kyi

text.en: Searched and strove, again and again, through hardship of every kind:
text.en-trans: yangyang kawé tsal zhing nakpé dön

text.en: So may this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Khenpo Śāntarakṣita, great master Padmasambhava, Dharma king Tri Songdetsen, incarnate translators and paṇḍitas,
text.en-trans: khen lob chögyal trulpé lo pen dang

text.en: Vidyādharas who hold kama and terma lineages, yidam deities,
text.en-trans: kater rigdzin gyüpa yidam lha

text.en: Ekajaṭī, Mahākāla, Za Rāhula, Dorje Lekpa and the proud protectors, male, female and diverse:
text.en-trans: magön za dor gyü sum drekpé tsok

text.en: All of you sources of blessing, attainment and activity in the Early Translations, turn your minds toward us!
text.en-trans: ngagyur tsa sum lhatsok gong su sol

text.en: You were the ones who, with all of your love and care,
text.en-trans: tubten do dang ngak kyi tsul tadak

text.en: Brought the Buddha’s teaching and its countless Dharma systems of sūtra and tantra to the Land of Snows.
text.en-trans: gangchen jong su tsewé drang gyurpa

text.en: So now remember your vajra promise to make them grow from strength to strength,
text.en-trans: ché cher pelwé dorjé dam gong né

text.en: And let this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The vajra body, speech and mind of buddhas throughout all of space and time,
text.en-trans: chok dü gyalwé ku sung tuk dorjé

text.en: Emanated as forms of Avalokiteśvara, Vajrapāṇi, and Mañjuśrī, whose magical display
text.en-trans: rik sum sempé gyutrul rolmo yi

text.en: Caused a sun of happiness to fill the Land of Snows with light.
text.en-trans: gangchen pendé nyima salwar dzé

text.en: This teaching of the lotus-born buddha: may it flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Then buddhas and sublime great bodhisattvas chose
text.en-trans: gyal dang gyalsé pakpa chenpö tsok

text.en: To emanate and be born there as lotsawas and scholars,
text.en-trans: samzhin trulpé dögar nyer zung né

text.en: To raise high the victory-banner with its jewel, the untarnished teachings of Buddha:
text.en-trans: drimé gyalten norbü gyaltsen dreng

text.en: So may this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: It was they alone who translated, without error, the common sciences and all the extraordinary scriptures,
text.en-trans: tünmong tünmin zhung kün rangwang gi

text.en: They who checked them and finalized them,
text.en-trans: manor gyur zhü ten la pabpa yi

text.en: So for the first time a great door was flung open, flooding the Land of Snows with the light of Dharma.
text.en-trans: gangjong nangwé go chen tokmar ché

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Fortunate disciples taking up the practice of
text.en-trans: kalzang duljé do dang ngak kyi tsul

text.en: The sūtras and tantras have no need to look elsewhere,
text.en-trans: nyam su len la zhen dring mijokpar

text.en: For within the Buddha’s words and the commentaries on his vision, everything is complete.
text.en-trans: ka dang gongpa drelwé zhung kün dzok

text.en: These teachings of the lotus-born buddha: may they flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The truth the Buddha taught—the kama transmission is vast and immeasurable,
text.en-trans: den sung ka yi gyatso chenpo la

text.en: Its full beauty brought out by the jewels of the profound termas
text.en-trans: zabmö chö ter norbü ngönpar dzé

text.en: To form a sublime path that unites both sūtra and mantra.
text.en-trans: do dang ngak kyi lam zang zung du drel

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The action of Śāntarakṣita, exquisite scholar of Zahor,
text.en-trans: mejung zahor khenpö chöpa dang

text.en: And the view of the unequalled, glorious Nāgārjuna
text.en-trans: tsungmé palden lu yi tawa nyi

text.en: Integrated as one, seal the tradition of this lineage:
text.en-trans: zung drel gyüpé ka sol chakgyé tab

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The quintessence of the three profound inner tantras lies in
text.en-trans: zabmö nanggyü dé sum gongpé chü

text.en: The uncommon pith instructions; their supreme and secret path leads
text.en-trans: tünmin mengak sangwé lamchok né

text.en: To the radiant wonder of entering the dharmakāya in a body of rainbow light:
text.en-trans: jalü chökur shekpé ngotsar bar

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The eight sādhanas of the infinite peaceful and wrathful deities
text.en-trans: rabjam zhitrö khyabdak drubdé gyé

text.en: Were transmitted to each of the eight vidyādharas. The essence of their realization
text.en-trans: kabab rigdzin sosö gong chü dang

text.en: And Padmasambhava’s tradition which combines them all are woven into one
text.en-trans: kündü pemé kasol chik tu khyil

text.en: In this teaching of the lotus-born buddha: may it flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The great causal vehicle and resultant secret mantra vehicle,
text.en-trans: gyu dang drebu sang ngak tekpa ché

text.en: Complete and unmistaken, with the original words of the vidyādhara lineage masters
text.en-trans: tsang la manor rigdzin gyüpé lung

text.en: And the hot breath of the ḍākinīs, straight from their lips —
text.en-trans: daki zhal gyi drö lang tolewa

text.en: Such is the teaching of the lotus-born Buddha: may it flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Vajradhara’s wisdom mind, its quintessential nectar,
text.en-trans: dorjé chang gi gongdön dütsi chü

text.en: Is transmitted from mouth to ear by millions of learned and realized beings,
text.en-trans: khedrub jewé zhal né nyen du gyü

text.en: Untainted by the inventions of wrong-headed intellectuals:
text.en-trans: tokgé ngenpé rang zö malepar

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Even by offering continents made of gold, covered with jewels,
text.en-trans: ser zhing norbü trepé yön gyi kyang

text.en: Teachings from the space ḍākinīs’ wisdom mind treasury can never be acquired,
text.en-trans: miguk ying kyi khandrö tuk dzö chö

text.en: For they are bestowed only out of love, and to worthy, fortunate disciples:
text.en-trans: tsewé jejuk kalpa khonar tram

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: In the wisdom of the essence, primordially pure,
text.en-trans: ngowo kané dakpé yeshe la

text.en: The radiance of its nature spontaneously shines out.
text.en-trans: rangzhin lhün gyi drubpé dang sharwé

text.en: So Great Perfection is utterly beyond the conceptual minds of dull meditators:
text.en-trans: lün gom sem lé depé dzokpa ché

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Where rigid concepts clinging to one side or another, existence or non-existence, naturally collapse,
text.en-trans: yömé chokrer zhenpé mikté zhik

text.en: And habitual grasping to extreme views is uprooted,
text.en-trans: tardzin tawé dzintang drung né chung

text.en: Ground, Path and Fruition are the union of appearance and emptiness:
text.en-trans: zhi lam drebu nangtong zung du juk

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The final meaning of all buddhas’ realization, past, present and future,
text.en-trans: dü sum gyalwé gongpa tartuk dön

text.en: “Profound, peace, natural simplicity, clear light, uncompounded”,
text.en-trans: zab zhi trödral ösal dümajé

text.en: Is the indestructible vajra viewpoint of inseparable awareness and emptiness:
text.en-trans: riktong mishik dorjé drubpé ta

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Anyone who has studied many teachings can draw on a teeming cloud of scriptural sources,
text.en-trans: mangdu töpa lung gi trin trik shing

text.en: And so defeat opponents with a reasoning that scorches like bolts of lightning,
text.en-trans: parol gol jom rigpé lok treng bar

text.en: While the nectar of the crucial points of the experiential pith-instructions seeps into their hearts:
text.en-trans: mengak né kyi dütsi nying la sim

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: By following this swift and secret path, the sublime Atiyoga,
text.en-trans: mejung atiyogé seng lam né

text.en: The wisdom body of all of the buddhas,
text.en-trans: malü gyalwa kün gyi yeshe ku

text.en: The universal lord, Mañjuśrī the Indestructible, is actually and perfectly realized:
text.en-trans: khyabdak jampal dorjer rab drubpa

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The lion’s roar, the three authentic teachings of scripture, reasoning and pith instruction,
text.en-trans: yangdak tsema sum gyi ngaro yi

text.en: Strikes terror among all other animals, the holders of lesser views.
text.en-trans: ta men ridak tsok nam trakdzepa

text.en: Just like the call of the lion, so too may the sound of Atiyoga, the supreme vehicle, fill the entire earth, above, below and in between,
text.en-trans: tek chok sengé drayang sa sum khyab

text.en: And this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: The Buddha’s teachings, so complete, are like the folds of exquisite silk in a banner of victory,
text.en-trans: gyalten yongsu dzokpé gö zang tser

text.en: And the Clear Light Vajra Essence of Dzogpachenpo, akin to the beautiful crowning jewel at its tip.
text.en-trans: ösal dorjé nyingpö tok dzepa

text.en: So raise this all-conquering banner high into the sky
text.en-trans: chok lé nampar gyalwé gyaltsen to

text.en: And let this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread for ages to come!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: From this day on, and as long as living beings remain,
text.en-trans: dak sok deng né drowa jisi du

text.en: I and others will hold, protect and spread the teachings of Buddha in their entirety, and especially their Heart Essence,
text.en-trans: ten dang tenpé nyingpo yongdzokpa

text.en: In buddha realms reaching through the whole of space,
text.en-trans: khakhyab zhing du dzin kyong pelwa yi

text.en: And so let us cause this teaching of the lotus-born buddha to flourish and to spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Finally, by emulating the learned, disciplined and realized practitioners,
text.en-trans: dorna khé tsün drubpé namtar gyi

text.en: Let true holders of the teachings spread the Buddhadharma, and their enlightening actions stretch throughout the universe.
text.en-trans: gyalten pelwé trinlé khakhyabpé

text.en: Let them appear everywhere on Earth, and thereby
text.en-trans: tendzin dampé sateng yong gang né

text.en: May this teaching of the lotus-born buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik

text.en: Let the lives of the glorious masters be forever secure and firm,
text.en-trans: palden lamé kutsé rabten ching

text.en: Let the prosperity, power and standing of the sponsors of the teachings grow,
text.en-trans: tenpé jindak ngatang darwa yi

text.en: Let the resources of the Dharma and of our world never wane, and may this jewelled victory banner fly forever,
text.en-trans: chösi minub norbü gyaltsen dreng

text.en: So the teaching of the lotus-born buddha spreads far and wide, and remains for ages to come!
text.en-trans: tsokyé gyalwé tenpa gyé gyur chik
